articles.content: He also took it from a private-held partnership to a public listing through a merger with Xstrata, which it had sponsored and helped fund into a mining powerhouse. The merger created the sprawling hy… [+6025 chars]

articles.title: IGA operator Metcash prepares for online shopping foray as sales surge - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The supplier of Australia's 1600-strong IGA supermarket network has accelerated its foray into online grocery delivery.
articles.content: Metcash is hoping to show off the service at an investor day in March, with Mr Adams confident the system will be in time be able to compete with the more developed offerings at Woolworths and Coles.… [+3245 chars]
